# Code of Conduct

## Purpose

This project is committed to creating a respectful and productive environment for all contributors. We expect participants to engage in discussions and development with professionalism, courtesy, and integrity.

## Expectations

All contributors are expected to:

- Be respectful and constructive in discussions
- Welcome differing viewpoints and ideas
- Provide and accept feedback with courtesy
- Collaborate in good faith toward shared goals
- Use appropriate language and tone
